Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the film 'Laxmmi Bomb'?
Options:
A. a) 'Laxmmi Bomb' is a remake of 'Kanchana (2011)'.
B. b) 'Laxmmi Bomb' is directed by Raghava Lawrence.
C. c) 'Laxmmi Bomb' belongs to the horror comedy genre.
D. d) 'Laxmmi Bomb' was Akshay Kumar's first film in the horror comedy genre.
Correct Answer: a) 'Laxmmi Bomb' is a remake of 'Kanchana (2011)'., b) 'Laxmmi Bomb' is directed by Raghava Lawrence., c) 'Laxmmi Bomb' belongs to the horror comedy genre.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding Akshay Kumar and the film Laxmmi Bomb?
Options:
A. a) Akshay Kumar stars in Laxmmi Bomb.
B. b) Laxmmi Bomb is a remake of Kanchana (2011).
C. c) Laxmmi Bomb is a horror comedy-genre film.
D. d) Akshay Kumar has never acted in a horror comedy before Laxmmi Bomb.
Correct Answer: a) Akshay Kumar stars in Laxmmi Bomb., b) Laxmmi Bomb is a remake of Kanchana (2011)., c) Laxmmi Bomb is a horror comedy-genre film.
